hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: Insurance, taxes and legal solutions in one place

auto.title: Auto Insurance
auto.cover: Liability, vehicle damage, theft and medical expenses.
auto.why: Required by law and protects your assets.

renters.title: Renters Insurance
renters.why: Landlord insurance does not cover tenants.

non-owned.title: Independent Contractors - Form 1099-NEC
non-owned.cover: Calculation of income, deductible expenses, and Schedule C preparation for contractors.
non-owned.why: Optimizes your deductions to pay the minimum tax legally allowed by the IRS.
non-owned.who: Independent contractors, freelancers, and gig economy drivers.

society.title: Business Entities (or Corporations)
society.cover: Calculation, reporting, and filing of sales taxes collected at the state level.
society.why: This is a fiduciary responsibility; failure to report can lead to severe criminal penalties and fines.
society.who: Businesses that sell physical products or services subject to state taxes.

corp.title: Corporations (S/C Corp)
corp.cover: Complex tax returns for corporate structures with dividend distribution.
corp.why: Allows for advanced tax planning to reduce the tax burden on shareholders.
corp.who: Businesses with multiple partners or those seeking a more robust tax structure.

local-liability.title: LLC Taxes
local-liability.cover: Tax preparation for Limited Liability Companies and profit reporting.
local-liability.why: Keeps your company in 'Good Standing' and avoids audits or administrative closures.
local-liability.who: Small business owners registered as an LLC in any state.

church.title: Churches or Non-Profits
church.cover: Management of federal and state withholdings and unemployment payments for your employees.
church.why: Ensures that payments to your workers are accurate and comply with all labor laws.
church.who: Any business owner with employees on payroll.

accounting.title: Bookkeeping & Accounting
accounting.cover: Monthly recording of income and expenses, bank reconciliation, and preparation of financial statements.
accounting.why: Allows you to know the real health of your business and be prepared for tax season.
accounting.who: Business owners who want to keep their finances organized and make data-driven decisions.

companies.title: Business Registration
companies.cover: Official registration with the State, obtaining an EIN, and preparation of operating documents.
companies.why: Formalizes your venture, protects your personal assets, and allows you to open business bank accounts.
companies.who: Entrepreneurs looking to start an LLC, Corporation, or any legal entity in the USA.

rep-companies.title: Payroll Services
rep-companies.cover: Payroll processing, calculation of federal/state withholdings, and issuance of pay stubs.
rep-companies.why: Ensures your employees are paid on time and your business remains compliant with labor laws.
rep-companies.who: Business owners with employees looking to automate and legalize their payroll payments.

legal-translation.cover: Broad authorization for a third party to manage assets and perform legal acts on your behalf.
legal-translation.title: Power of Attorney
legal-translation.why: Ensures your affairs continue to operate if you are out of the country or incapacitated.
legal-translation.who: Individuals traveling for long periods or those in need of absolute legal representation.

Tlegal.cover: Documentation for the appointment of legal guardians for minors or dependents.
Tlegal.title: Legal Guardianship
Tlegal.why: Ensures your loved ones are placed under the care of individuals you fully trust.
Tlegal.who: Parents and guardians who wish to protect the custody of their children in the event of any contingency.

certifications.cover: Validation of copies of original documents such as degrees, certificates, or IDs.
certifications.title: Certified Copies
certifications.why: Allows you to provide a true copy of the original with notarized support for official procedures.
certifications.who: Students or professionals applying to jobs or educational institutions.
